author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two high school students drowned while swimming in Dasarahalli lake, near Hebbal, on Friday around 2.30 p.m. The deceased are Rishikesh (15), a student of Triveni High School, and Rohith (16) of Priyadarshini High School.

According to the police, the boys told their parents that they were going to a temple. Instead, they sneaked into the fenced lake with their friends Abhishek and Raghavendra.

While Rishikesh and Rohith went for a swim, the other two stayed on the banks. As the duo ventured deeper into the lake, they were overcome by the strong current. When their realised that their friends were drowning, Abhishek and Raghavendra sought help from local residents. But by the time they returned with help, there was no sign of the boys. The Fire and Emergency Services Department recovered the bodies after a two-hour search operation.

A senior police officer said, “The lake is fenced. The gates were locked. The boys sneaked in through a small gap. The boys informed their parents that they would go to a nearby temple, but instead went for a swim.”

title: Two boys drown in Dasarahalli lake
